name: Garage
headline: Marketplace for used firefighting equipment.
description:
Garage is a marketplace for pre-owned equipment, starting with firefighting equipment. 

Garage helps fire departments buy and sell used equipment in seconds rather than days. Our marketplace handles payments, freight, and financing – making buying and selling equipment easy & secure.

# Frequently asked questions
Questions? We're here to help.
What is Garage?
Garage is an online marketplace for used equipment and apparatus. We are the go-to place for fire departments, brokers, and dealers to sell surplus equipment to a department in need.
Can I talk to a real person on the phone about Garage?
A member of our team is available 7 days a week. Call us anytime at (201) 293-7164.
Can I make a purchase via credit card? What about PayPal?
We accept Visa, Mastercard, American Express, and Discover. We also accept Paypal.
How do I list my equipment or truck on Garage?
Listing on Garage is free, and takes less than 90 seconds! Click on "Start selling" on the top right of your screen to get started. Have questions? Reach out to us at support@withgarage.com and a member of Garage's team will be happy to set up your listing for you.
What happens when my listing sells?
If your loose equipment fits in a box and can be shipped via parcel (USPS, UPS, FedEx), then you will automatically receive a shipping label when your item(s) sell on Garage. When you sell a piece of fire apparatus, heavy equipment, or other vehicle on Garage, a member of our operations team will handle everything from freight to payment for you.
Can I make purchases on Garage via check?
Yes! To pay via check, please contact support@withgarage.com with the listing you are interested in and a member of the Garage team will help you complete your purchase.
Does Garage ship internationally?
Yes! You can make a purchase by clicking on "Buy Now" in the checkout process. If you run into any issues, reach out to support@withgarage.com and a member of the Garage team would be happy to help you complete your purchase!

# Frequently asked questions
Questions? We're here to help.
What is Garage?
Garage is an online marketplace for used equipment and apparatus. We are the go-to place for fire departments, brokers, and dealers to sell surplus equipment to a department in need.
Can I talk to a real person on the phone about Garage?
A member of our team is available 7 days a week. Call us anytime at (201) 293-7164.
Can I make a purchase via credit card? What about PayPal?
We accept Visa, Mastercard, American Express, and Discover. We also accept Paypal.
How do I list my equipment or truck on Garage?
Listing on Garage is free, and takes less than 90 seconds! Click on "Start selling" on the top right of your screen to get started. Have questions? Reach out to us at support@withgarage.com and a member of Garage's team will be happy to set up your listing for you.
What happens when my listing sells?
If your loose equipment fits in a box and can be shipped via parcel (USPS, UPS, FedEx), then you will automatically receive a shipping label when your item(s) sell on Garage. When you sell a piece of fire apparatus, heavy equipment, or other vehicle on Garage, a member of our operations team will handle everything from freight to payment for you.
Can I make purchases on Garage via check?
Yes! To pay via check, please contact support@withgarage.com with the listing you are interested in and a member of the Garage team will help you complete your purchase.
Does Garage ship internationally?
Yes! You can make a purchase by clicking on "Buy Now" in the checkout process. If you run into any issues, reach out to support@withgarage.com and a member of the Garage team would be happy to help you complete your purchase!

generated_description:
**Garage: Revolutionizing the Marketplace for Firefighting Equipment**

Founded in 2023 and currently part of the Y Combinator Batch W24, Garage has set out to change how fire departments trade used firefighting equipment. With a tight-knit team of four based in an undisclosed location, Garage addresses a vital market need: the ability to buy and sell used firefighting apparatus quickly and securely.

**What Garage Does**

The core mission of Garage is simple yet impactful: it creates a seamless experience for fire departments looking to buy or sell pre-owned equipment. Traditionally, such transactions could take days, involving cumbersome processes for payment, freight, and financing. Garage streamlines everything, allowing these departments to complete transactions in seconds.

Here’s what sets Garage apart:
- **Marketplace Dynamics**: It operates as a go-to platform specifically for firefighting equipment, ambulances, and related gear.
- **Simplicity and Speed**: Users can browse listings or start selling in just 90 seconds.
- **Comprehensive Support**: The platform offers dedicated customer support and handles all logistics from payments to freight, providing a secure environment for transactions.

**Product Offerings**

Garage’s marketplace features a diverse range of listings:
- **Fire Apparatus**: Essential fire trucks and emergency vehicles.
- **Ambulances**: Serving the needs of medical responders with pre-owned units.
- **Specialized Equipment**: From hydraulic tools to breathing apparatuses, the breadth of inventory ensures that departments can find exactly what they need.

**User-Friendly Experience**

The platform boasts user-friendly features, including:
- Easy navigation through categories of available listings.
- Secure payment options, including credit cards and PayPal.
- A free appraisal service for sellers to establish fair market value for their items.

**Why Choose Garage?**

Backed by glowing reviews, Garage has earned a reputation among departments nationwide. Customers appreciate the speed of service, the ease of transactions, and the professionalism of the support team. Quotes for freight and warranties are provided instantly, making it easier for departments to budget and plan.

**Contact Information**
For anyone interested in buying or selling used firefighting equipment, you can learn more and start exploring at [Garage's website](https://www.withgarage.com/). For assistance, they can be reached at (201) 293-7164 or via email at support@withgarage.com. 

In conclusion, Garage is an innovative solution that meets a vital need in the firefighting community, transforming the landscape of used equipment sales. It’s a marketplace built by and for those who serve, ensuring their operations run smoothly and efficiently.
